title: Beachfront Kuwait City Oasis with Three Restaurants, Five Pools & Onsite Spa
description:
Settle into sun-soaked comfort at this beachside escape in Kuwait City, where palm-lined shores and warm Persian Gulf breezes invite you to slow down. With Mediterranean-inspired designs, five sparkling pools, direct beach access, fitness centre overlooking the pool and soothing spa offering a wide range of treatments, relaxation comes easy here.

Dining is a highlight - sample local seafood and mixed grills at Beldani Restaurant; indulge in decadent all-day dining at Breeze Restaurant; or relax with baked treats on the sea-facing terrace at Veranda Cafe. After a day of exploring the Kuwait Towers or shopping at Souk Al-Salmiah and Marina World, return to your well-appointed room, suite or villa to unwind in style.

title: Five-Star Kuwait Glamour with Eight Outstanding Restaurants
description: Embrace the ancient culture and fascinating sites of Kuwait City from your luxurious base, the five-star Crowne Plaza Kuwait Al Thuraya City, an IHG Hotel. Spend your downtime working out at Kuwait's largest hotel fitness centre, Health Club Edge, or slip into a Spa Aquatonic pool for some well-deserved pampering. You're spoilt for choice when it comes to dining: with eight restaurants onsite, whether you're craving succulent rib eye steak, fresh seafood or teppanyaki, you'll find it here.
